channel.title: Carbon-Capture on cobra.blog
channel.description: Recent content in Carbon-Capture on cobra.blog

item.title: Feasibility of Transatlantic Carbon Shipping
item.description: Feasibility of Shipping Carbon Across the Atlantic Methodology Please review the my previous post which details the design of my model. The major difference in this report is the sampling of the mean price per voyage. The conversion error has been corrected. Findings Distance of Transport The standard deviation in mean price per voyage was found to be less than 0. This suggests that the distance of travel within Europe is marginal.
